heroSection.title:
The Space
That Moves You
heroSection.subtitle: Premium padel & gym club built for motion, balance, and flow.

card1.title: Try the Beat for a Day
card1.description: Discover the rhythm of Beat Club — access to padel, gym, and barre zones for a full day. No trainers included. Just movement, flow, and freedom.

communitySection.title: Beat Creates The Energy And Space To Move — Freely, Consciously, Together.
communitySection.description: No pressure, no noise – just thoughtful design, expert coaching, and a rhythm that helps you stay consistent and inspired.

aboutSection.subtitle: ABOUT BEAT CLUB
aboutSection.title: DESIGNED FOR BODY AND MIND
aboutSection.paragraph1: At Beat, everything is built around rhythm – your inner pace and physical balance.
aboutSection.paragraph2: The gym is designed to inspire focus and strength through clean architecture, natural light, and a minimal environment that keeps your attention on movement.
aboutSection.paragraph3: After training, the Beat Bar invites you to slow down. Signature drinks, curated playlists, and warm design elements help you recharge and connect – with yourself, your team, or just the moment.
